short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interactive product tours, smart tips and checklists for digital products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Usetiful is a Digital Adoption Platform that improves onboarding and user experience in your digital products. 

With the Usetiful extension you can:

✅ Seamlessly preview any Usetiful content like product tours and checklists in your browser, ensuring perfect alignment with your website’s design before going live.
✅ Quickly select and sync website elements with the Usetiful editor for easy updates.
✅ Use the extension to demonstrate Usetiful features on third-party platforms where direct installation isn’t possible, ideal for internal training and demos.

Streamline your content creation without touching single line of code.
